Detailed Description

The class PbFfsNameHandler will be used to change, write and read phone book entries. All phone book entries will be stored in a file on FFS.

void PbFfsNameHandler::Init (   )  [virtual]
 

Class initialisation; File with saved phone book entry will be read from FFS. If no file is existing a new file will be created.

Reimplemented from PbRecordHandler.
